title: It has been reported that the Simpsons will only stream on Disney+ (plus) would you be willing to pay $6.99 to watch the Simpsons? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. I am not willing to pay that amount to just watch The Simpsons.  However, I am willing to pay that amount for Disney Plus' impressive array of popular brands and top quality content.  I am most excited with their announced original content from Marvel (e.g. WandaVision, The Falcon and The Winter Soldier, untitled Hawkeye series, untitled Loki series, animated What If series), Disney Channel (e.g. High School Musical: The Musical: The Series, new Phineas & Ferb movie) and Star Wars (e.g. new season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars, The Mandalorian, untitled Cassian Andor & K-2SO series).
No. The Simpsons is trash that should have been died. I'll pay for the marvel spin-offs and the other Disney content, but I'd never click on Simpsons ever. It's garbage.
